content: Credit Card Asked by AnonymousAsked on 23 Apr 2019Has anyone used Youtrip card for car rental payments in Australia at the major car rental companies? Would they accept the use of the card for collection of deposits and final payment after returning the car?1 answerAnswerBump0

Brandan Chen, Financial Planner at Manulife SingaporeLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 23 Apr 2019I just came back from a trip in Spain and we rented a car from Sixt Car.I paid using my Youtrip and the deposit was refunded to my card within 48 hours when i returned the car.Hope this helps0 comments0
